name: Twista
description:
Twista is an adrenaline-filled 2D platformer, a real test of wits and reflexes. There is an immersive adventure waiting for you in this game. The color of the map and your character completely reverses as you jump, making the game both fun and challenging.

Inverted World: As you jump, the world and your character's colors are reversed. This requires strategic thinking and quick reactions with every jump.

Challenging Obstacles: Your character will face difficult obstacles in four different main levels and 20 challenging levels in total. You must use your skills and intelligence to overcome the obstacles.

Frustrating Difficulty Level: Twista is one of the most difficult games in the world. This seemingly innocent game will put its players in a war of nerves with the difficulties it contains.

Chapter Endings: Each main chapter has a chapter ending waiting for you. You must maximize your intelligence and reflexes to reach this point.

Twista brings you a fun platformer experience, but remember, this game can fool you; the more you play, the more you'll realize what it means to get angry. Are you ready to push your limits to overcome the challenges?


Hint: Don't get lost...
